question.body: Which of the following does not consist of nerves?

response.feedback: Correct. The brain and the spinal cord form the “headquarters” of the nervous system, but does not contain the nerves..
Incorrect. These types of nerves transport sensory impulses to the brain from the environment.
Incorrect. These types of nerves transmit both sensory and motor information.
Incorrect. The Peripheral Nervous System is comprised of nerves.
Incorrect. This part of the nervous system sends motor information to skeletal muscles.

part.hint: Nerves are not part of this branch of the nervous system.

question.body: Which of the following carry impulses to brain from the environment?

response.feedback: Incorrect. The brain and the spinal cord form the “headquarters” of the nervous system.
Correct. Sensory nerves transport sensory impulses to the brain from the environment.
Incorrect. This type of nerve transmits both sensory and motor information.
Incorrect. This division of the nervous system sends both motor and sensory information.
Incorrect. This division of the nervous system sends motor information to skeletal muscles.

part.hint: Which type of nerve transports sensory impulses to the brain from the environment?

question.body: Which of the following consists of the brain and spinal cord?

response.feedback: Correct. The Central Nervous System consists of the brain and spinal cord.
Incorrect. Which type of nerve transports sensory impulses to the brain from the environment?
Incorrect. Which type of nerve transmits both sensory and motor information?
Incorrect. Nerves are the main component of this branch of the nervous system.
Incorrect. Which nervous system sends motor information to skeletal muscles?

part.hint: The brain and the spinal cord form the “headquarters” of the nervous system.

question.body: Which of the following controls skeletal muscle?

response.feedback: Incorrect. The brain and the spinal cord form the “headquarters” of the nervous system.
Incorrect. Which type of nerve transports sensory impulses to the brain from the environment?
Incorrect. Which type of nerve transmits both sensory and motor information?
Incorrect. Nerves are the main component of this branch of the nervous system.
Correct. The Somatic Nervous System sends motor information to your skeletal muscles.
